title: War of the Roses: She Hid Under the Stairs
description: Christina found a random pill and chapstick at her house that wasn't hers or her husband, Robert's, so now she is suspecting Robert might be cheating.  She decided to set a trap for her husband that led to her hiding under the stairs for a few hours but didn't have any luck so now she needs help from us to find out once and for all what Robert is up to.
